description:
Interactive visualization showing mastery levels across different concepts and topics, with prerequisite relationships displayed as a skill tree. Updates automatically based on question performance, notebook activity, and solve agent interactions.

**Rationale:** Users need clear visibility into what they've mastered and what requires more work. Visual progress tracking motivates learners and helps identify knowledge gaps, a standard feature in modern educational platforms.
title: Concept Mastery Tracker with Visual Progress Maps
